New Records: Virat Kohli equalled Sachin Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds
Key Match Events: India bowled out South Africa for 83 runs
Ravindra Jadeja became the first Indian bowler to take a World Cup five-wicket haul
Kuldeep Yadav took the final wicket to put the stamp on a devastating 243-run victory
Pre-Game Insights: There were questions about South Africa's ability to chase after their previous performances
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli said he is enjoying playing cricket all over again
Kohli equalled Tendulkar's record in ODIs and said it is all too much to take in right now
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fireworks erupted from the stadium rooftop as India celebrated their victory
